SA10bsa038_u:3_0: atra bodhisattvānāṃ ratnopamāḥ pañcāśad dharmāḥ prāṇopamādayaḥ / tān abhidhāsye kiñcit / tadyathā-
SA10bsa038_u:4_6: gṛhavad daśa kuśalāni / imāmi tu gṛhameva durgatidvārapidhānāt /
SA10bsa038_u:4_8: alpecchatā, saṃtoṣaśca / mitravat tridhātuprayogaṃ kurvannapi nirvāṇāśayatā,
SA10bsa038_u:4_12: mūlasamāḥ śraddhā, śravaṇaṃ, tyāgaḥ , kṣāntiśca / kṣetropamaṃ śīlam / bandhusamāḥ daśapāramitāḥ / ācāryopamāstu ṣaḍanusmṛtayaḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:5_3: dhātrīsamaṃ kalyāṇamitram / rājopamaṃ triratnam / toyasaṃkāropamā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:5_7: alaṅkāropamāḥ śraddhā, śīlaṃ, tyāgaḥ, śrutaṃ, prajñā ca / vyādhipīḍopamaṃ tu ādhyātmikabāhyavastvabhiniviṣṭacittam /
SA10bsa038_u:5_8: hatacittapuruṣavat gṛhastho bodhisattva evaṃ vicārayati- kadāhaṃ brahmacārī bhaveyam /
SA10bsa038_u:5_9: pravrajita evaṃ cintayati- kadāhaṃ jagato duḥkhāni moktuṃ kṣama iti /
SA10bsa038_u:6_2: svaguṇānākhyātā, aparanindakaśca / andhopamo 'paradoṣadraṣṭā / gṛhītacauropamaḥ saddharmavināśe saddharmagrāhakaḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:6_3: bālopamaḥ suvāk, sphūrtimān, sukhadaḥ, sutoṣaḥ, supoṣaḥ, subharaḥ, santuṣṭaśca / dūtopamastu bodhisattvo bahvartho bahukriya udāracittaśca /
SA10bsa038_u:7_1: ke ca (te) pañcapañcāśad? 'āryabodhisattvapiṭake' tadyathā- āntarāyika eko dharmaḥ- pramādaḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:7_3: trayaḥ- rāgo dveṣo mohaśca / catvāraḥ- catasraḥ asadgatayaḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:7_6: sapta- saptavidhā mānāḥ / aṣṭau-mithyāṣṭakam / nava- navadhā cittāghātavastūni /
SA10bsa038_u:8_0: dvātriṃśad āntarāyikā dharmā api 'āryamahāyānopadeśasūtre' tadyathā- 'putri! mahāyānāntarāyikā dharmāstu dvātriṃśat /
SA10bsa038_u:8_1: tairāntarāyikaiḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śīghraṃ na niryāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA10bsa038_u:8_3_0: indrabrahmatvakāmitā, janmasaṃsthabrahmacaryam, kuśalamūlaikarāgaḥ, bhogasampatmātsaryam, sattvaviṣamadānam, śīlaśaithilyam,
SA10bsa038_u:8_3_1: paracittārakṣaṇam, vyāpāda-pratighānuśayaḥ, taccittalayaḥ, muṣitasmṛtitā, śravaṇānarthikatā, avicāraṇā, anāryacaryā, mānātimānavivṛddhiḥ,
SA10bsa038_u:8_4: saddharmāparirakṣaṇam, ācāryadharmapraticchādanam, saṃgrahavastūtsargaḥ, sammodanīyadharmatyāgaḥ, pāpamitrasevanam, bodhyapariṇāmaneti triskandhavipakṣatā,
SA10bsa038_u:9_0: 'putri! dvātriṃśad ime mahāyānasya āntarāyikāḥ samyak vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
SA10bsa038_u:9_2: kiṃ tarhi? tathāpi putri, yāvanto hi mahāyānaguṇā antarāyā api tāvantastāvad ityuktam /
SA10bsa038_u:9_3: api ca, aprameyā antarāyadharmā bahuṣu sūtreṣu dṛśyante,
SA10bsa038_u:9_6: aparāṇyapi sāṃkathyāni bahūni vartante-sughoraparuṣaṃ suduḥsahaṃ dukhaṃ ciraṃ sahyata idamapi mahadāścaryam /
SA10bsa038_u:9_8: bhāryā gṛhaṃ ca prahāya suvratādāne 'pi sadā kāyavāṅmanovikṣepa idamapi mahadāścaryam /
SA10bsa038_u:9_9_0: svalpamātrasyāpi kuśalamūlasya abhāve 'pi tasyaivārthato buddhajñānagaveṣaṇam idamapi mahadāścaryam pratimokṣaśikṣābhāve
SA10bsa038_u:9_12: tasmād bhavanto muktikāmā vidvāṃsastairunmattaiḥ saha akṛtasaṃsargā apramattās tiṣṭhantu /
SA10bsa038_u:9_13: evaṃ te karuṇāviṣayatvavyatiriktāḥ uttamamārgavyapadeśe 'pi tatra na praviśanti,
SA10bsa038_u:9_14: kimahaṃ karavāṇi / yāvad abhijñatā na prāpyate tāvad anyeṣāṃ vipākāsaṃbhavāt khaḍgavat sthātavyam /
SA10bsa038_u:11_0: tenaiva bhāratīyamahopādhyāyena mahāsaṃśodhakalokacakṣuṣā jayaśīlena (chul khrimas rgyal va) ca anūdya sampādya ca nirṇītaḥ /
